headers.subject: Re: Finding broken regex'es
headers.comments: In-reply-to Erik Jones <erik@myemma.com> message dated "Tue, 02 Oct 2007 16:36:55 -0500"

quote.quotepara: IIRC, if they're PERL compatible which it would seem from the php function you're using, no. Postgres supports POSIX regexes but not (right now anyway) PERL regexes.

body.para: Actually what we support are Tcl (Henry Spencer) regexes, which are about as powerful as Perl's but have a few minor incompatibilities. Tcl and Perl regexes are both supersets of the POSIX requirements.
